intro: Psychotria surianii, commonly known as the Surinam Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pink flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria surianii is also noted for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its uses.
